content.en: Energy Optimization: Researchers are exploring the use of algorithms to improve energy management in hybrid electric vehicles. They are investigating the merits and demerits of Q-learning and Dyna algorithms, as well as reinforcement learning, stochastic model predictive control, heuristic search, imitation reinforcement learning, and Monte Carlo tree search algorithms. These algorithms have the potential to optimize fuel consumption, improve fuel efficiency, minimize battery degradation, and enhance the adaptability of energy management strategies in hybrid electric vehicles.
content.da: Energioptimering: Forskere undersøger brugen af algoritmer til at forbedre energistyring i hybrid-elektriske køretøjer. De undersøger fordelene og ulemperne ved Q-learning og Dyna-algoritmer samt reinforcement learning, stokastisk model-prædiktiv kontrol, heuristisk søgning, imitation reinforcement learning og Monte Carlo-træsøgningsalgoritmer. Disse algoritmer har potentialet til at optimere brændstofforbrug, forbedre brændstofeffektivitet, minimere batterinedbrydning og styrke tilpasningsevnen i energistyringsstrategier for hybrid-elektriske køretøjer.
